pony.Ultra

Please not use "null" for TInt, use "nullInt"! This save you!
Ultra it is good constants pack ;)
Also ultra it is good extensions pack, write: 
  import pony.Ultra;
  using.Ultra;
- this make you happy!
authors
AxGord
type
class


Static Variables

maxInt(inline,null) : Int

minInt(inline,null) : Int

nullInt(inline,null) : Int

Just "null" not work in as3, use this all time and you no take problem. And use (minInt - 1) ;)

Static Methods

randomString(?string_length : Int) : String
